content: this fisherman s sweater keeps you wonderfully warm during chilly winter days a classic knitted cable sweater like this is a must-have in your wardrobe the yarn used durable norwool plus is not only pleasantly warm but also hard-wearing thanks to the polyamide content what makes this beautiful sweater extra special is that it can be worn by both men and women the pattern is written for sizes s m l xl example is size l small l yarn durable norwool plus 40% acrylic 40% polyamide 20% superwash wool 100g/160m color a 004 light grey 8 8 9 9 balls design kristina de barse
